It looks like your device is not currently connected to the internet.

routes.updatesError: An error occurred while attempting to load updates from Israel Railways
routes.maxBackwardsDate: Cannot go back more than 3 days

routeDetails.routeWarningText: There are shorter train routes around the departure time.
routeDetails.noCalendarAccessMessage: To add the ride to your calendar, open your device settings and grant access to your calendar.

settings.title: Settings
settings.languageChangeAlertMessage: The app will restart to apply the changes
settings.tipJarTitle: Better Rail relies on your support to fund it's development
settings.tipJarSubtitle: If you love using Better Rail, please consider supporting the app by sending a tip.
settings.thankYouText:
We appreciate this donation from the bottom of our hearts. 

 Enjoy the ride! 
Guy & Matan
settings.testflightMessage:
The app has been installed via TestFlight.
In order to send a tip, you'll need to download the app from the App Store.
settings.aboutText: Better Rail is an open source app that aims to make Israel Railways schedules more accessible to the public.
settings.deleteAllDataConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete the local app data? This action cannot be undone.

favorites.title: Favorite Routes
favorites.emptyDescription: You can add a favorite from the routes screen
favorites.renamePromptPlaceholder: Enter a name for the route...

modals.noTrainsFoundForDate: No trains found for the requested date
modals.noTrainsFoundForHour: No trains found at the requested time
modals.foundTrainsAtHour: Trains available at different times on the selected date

widgetOnboarding.widgetDescription: Beautiful widgets for checking the upcoming train schedule.
widgetOnboarding.widgetGuide: Here's a quick set up guide with a few tips on how to get the full benefit from them.
widgetOnboarding.addStep1: 1. From the Home Screen, touch and hold a widget or an empty area until the apps jiggle.
widgetOnboarding.addStep2: 2. Tap the Add button (+) in the upper-left corner.
widgetOnboarding.addStep3: 3. Select Better Rail from the list, the desired widget size and press "Add Widget".
widgetOnboarding.configStep1: 1. Touch and hold a widget to open the quick actions menu.
widgetOnboarding.configStep3: 3. Select the stations for the widget, then tap outside the widget to exit.
widgetOnboarding.stackingIntro: In order to display 2 routes inside one widget (i.e. riding to work and back), you can create a widget stack.
widgetOnboarding.stackingStep1: 1. Touch and hold an area on your Home Screen until the apps jiggle.
widgetOnboarding.stackingStep2: 2. Drag a widget on top of another widget.
widgetOnboarding.stackingStep3: 3. Inside the stack you can scroll between the two widgets.
widgetOnboarding.stackingStep4: Tip: You can view the full train scheduale quickly by tapping on the widget.

announcement.title: Better Rail Live
announcement.subtitle: Real-time updates with
announcement.description: Notifications about train delays, arrival time, travel instructions and more - all on your device lock screen.
announcement.androidDescription: Train delay notifications, arrival time, travel instructions and more.
announcement.weMadeAGuide: We prepared a short guide on using this feature, which will change the way you travel with Israel Railways.

startRide.title: Start Ride
startRide.description: To use Better Rail Live, select a train from the list, then press "Start Ride" at the bottom of the screen.
startRide.description2: The trip details screen will now display the train progress, remaining time, and delay updates.

liveActivity.title: Live Activity
liveActivity.description: Once you've started a ride, it'll be added to the lock screen and will be automatically updated with the train progress and delays.
liveActivity.androidDescription: Once you've started a ride, it'll be added to the notifications screen and will automatically be updated with the train progress and delays.
liveActivity.tip: Tip: You can start your trip up to an hour before the train's departure time. This allows you to determine if you need to hurry to catch the train or not.

dynamicIsland.title: Dynamic Island
dynamicIsland.description: Have an iPhone with Dynamic Island? You've just received new superpowers.
dynamicIsland.description2: The trip data will appear on the Dynamic Island, which you can access from anywhere on the device.

supportUs.title: Hey! We're Guy & Matan
supportUs.description1: We're passionate train travelers who set out to develop an exceptional app for Israel Railways.
supportUs.description3: Creating Better Rail involves hundreds of hours of work, and we're covering the app's maintenance costs ourselves.
supportUs.description4: If our app improved your train travel experience, please consider supporting us.
supportUs.description5: Financial support helps us cover expenses, dedicate more time to improve the app, and create cool new features.
supportUs.tipJarNote: Access the tip jar anytime through the app settings.

ride.rideInFutureAlert: You can start a new ride only from an hour before the train's departure time.
ride.getOffNextStop: Get off at the next stop
ride.greeting: Thanks for riding with Better Rail
ride.rideExistsMessage: Starting a new ride will cancel the current one
ride.liveActivitiesDisabledMessage: To start a ride, please open your device settings and enable Live Activities.
ride.notificationsDisabledMessage: To start a ride, please open your device settings and enable notifications.
ride.alarmDisabledMessage: To notify you when to get off the train more accurately, please open your device settings and enable alarm notifications.
ride.error: An error occurred while starting the ride - please try to start a new ride.
ride.notificationPermission1: To receive real-time updates on the train's progress, please grant permission for us to send you notifications.
ride.notificationPermission2: Our notification system is designed for efficiency, and we avoid sending unnecessary alerts.

paywall.intro: Supercharge your train travels and support the app development.
paywall.afterTrial: Afterwards, it's less than a cup of coffee ‚òïÔ∏è
paywall.liveActivityDetail: Real-Time updates for your train ride.
paywall.widgetsDetail: View the train schedule on your homescreen.
paywall.appleWatchAppDetail: Train scheduale right from your wrist.
paywall.appIconsDetail: Spruce up your homescreen with 3 alternate app icons.
paywall.supportProjectDetail: Directly support our ability to keep adding fun new features.

notifications.newButtonContent: Receive updates on events related to your stations
notifications.requestPermissionContent: Allow Better Rail to send you notifications related to your stations.
notifications.notificationSetupContent: Better Rail will send you updates on events related to your selected stations
notifications.notificationNote: Please note: While Better Rail will do its best to provide fast and reliable updates, it is always advisable to check with the official sources of Israel Railways as well.
